heading: HB08966
0: AN ACT DECLARING JULY 12 OF EVERY YEAR A SPECIAL WORKING HOLIDAY IN THE ENTIRE COUNTRY TO BE KNOWN AS "WEST PHILIPPINE SEA VICTORY DAY", TO COMMEMORATE THE HISTORIC DECISION OF THE PERMANENT COURT OF ARBITRATION (PCA) IN FAVOR OF THE PHILIPPINES OVER THE WEST PHILIPPINE SEA MARITIME DISPUTE
short-title: Declaring July 12 Of Every Year A Special Working Holiday In The Entire Country To Be Known As " West Philippine Sea Victory Day ", To Commemorate The Historic Decision Of The Permanent Court Of Arbitration ( P C A ) In Favor Of The Philippines Over The West Philippine Sea Maritime Dispute
principal-authors: ALEJANO, GARY C.; PRIMICIAS-AGABAS, MARLYN L.;
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08966
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING JULY 12 OF EVERY YEAR A SPECIAL WORKING HOLIDAY IN THE ENTIRE COUNTRY TO BE KNOWN AS "WEST PHILIPPINE SEA VICTORY DAY", TO COMMEMORATE THE HISTORIC DECISION OF THE PERMANENT COURT OF ARBITRATION (PCA) IN FAVOR OF THE PHILIPPINES OVER THE WEST PHILIPPINE SEA MARITIME DISPUTE
SHORT TITLE : Declaring July 12 Of Every Year A Special Working Holiday In The Entire Country To Be Known As " West Philippine Sea Victory Day ", To Commemorate The Historic Decision Of The Permanent Court Of Arbitration ( P C A ) In Favor Of The Philippines Over The West Philippine Sea Maritime Dispute
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C., PRIMICIAS-AGABAS, MARLYN L.
DATE FILED : 2019-01-31
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
